name: Simply Top Down Shooter (STDS)
description:
STDS is simple top down shooter game with story. Player can progress skills  to finish all campign scenerios. Boss is waiting for you in final battle.  For now story is ready i only Polish language verion. For some time i add english to.

Game isn't ready so please comment (give me notes about bugs  and give me  som eadvice for it).
